name: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time / Master Quest
name_original: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time / Master Quest
description: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time/Master Quest was a pre-order bonus for The Wind Waker. In addition to having the original Ocarina of Time in playable form on the GameCube, it also has Master Quest, which changed the dungeons and made them harder.
